attributes.action: MAKE CRIMINALS SERVE THEIR COMPLETE SENTANCE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: criminals should serve the sentence they are given not half of it, why should they have better conditions inside our prisons at our expence than they had in their own homes, and why should they have the same rights and more in some cases than there victims. life should mean life! and not a 5 year holiday, these people should be giving penance for their wrong doing. its time for a re balance,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
